short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Measure your carbon emissions whilst you browse the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your internet activity produces carbon. Track your output with our free web browser plugin, and be more carbon-conscious.
The internet has 5 billion users, and counting. You're one of them. If even a small number of people became more carbon-conscious in relation to web browsing, it would save enough energy to make a difference. User our browser plugin to be aware of your carbon output over time.
